BR_text.BRsummary: Security Question what is the 'google" package ray is installing? (pip install ray)
BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-h:h3>What is the problem?</denchmark-h>
 
 The 'google' package required by ray looks very suspect and is not an official google package.
 <denchmark-link:https://pypi.org/project/google/>https://pypi.org/project/google/</denchmark-link>
 
 is very suspect. No source link, home page links off to some random blog.  Author link goes no where.
 Certainly not done by google.
 Ray version and other system information (Python version, TensorFlow version, OS):
 pip list | grep ray
 ray                      1.0.1
 <denchmark-h:h3>Reproduction (REQUIRED)</denchmark-h>
 
 pip install ray

comments_0.comment_text:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/thomasdesr>@thomasdesr</denchmark-link>
  Can you also have a look at this?

comments_1.comment_text:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/ricpruss>@ricpruss</denchmark-link>
  thanks a bunch for opening this issue! That's a bad oversight on our side:
 This was introduced in: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ray-project/ray/pull/6045>#6045</denchmark-link>
  by <denchmark-link:https://github.com/pcmoritz>@pcmoritz</denchmark-link>
 
 We should perhaps install  (as seen in this repo: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/benhodgson/protobuf-to-dict/blob/master/setup.py>https://github.com/benhodgson/protobuf-to-dict/blob/master/setup.py</denchmark-link>
 ). Or just vendor the protobuf-to-dict inside ray repo.

comments_2.comment_text: It seems to me that we are not actually using this package (it is unrelated to the google namespace we are using), so just removing the requirement might fix the issue.

comments_3.comment_text:
I created a PR here: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ray-project/ray/pull/12085>#12085</denchmark-link>
 
 Let's see if that fixes it, or if we need additional dependencies here!

comments_4.comment_text: Thanks a lot for flagging this <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ricpruss>@ricpruss</denchmark-link>

comments_5.comment_text:
Thanks you certainly have fixed it fast,
 Ric
